attributes.action: Implement Bank Holiday in the name of emergency workers fighting COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: This is a small recognition for the sacrifice NHS workers and emergency service personnel have made during this National Emergency, a day the Nation can come together to reflect upon this heroism
attributes.background:
Implement a Bank Holiday in the name of NHS workers and emergency service personnel who continue to fight against the COVID19 outbreak. 
 
Bring the Nation together to mark the sacrifice that has been made by these brave abs heroic men and women

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
